projects.name: Artifact
projects.description: PM Content Sharing Platform - A modern desktop application for product managers to create, share, and collaborate on artifacts including specs, screenshots, Figma links, prototypes, and ideas.
features: Image, video, GIF, and URL embedding

projects.name: PM Spec Analyzer
projects.description: Socratic review tool for PM specs. Analyzes specs, asks clarifying questions one at a time to improve thinking, then provides actionable feedback.
features: Session auto-save with full Q&A transcript
No API keys needed - runs locally

projects.name: PM Spec Analyzer Mac App
projects.description: Native tkinter-based Mac application for spec analysis with local processing through Claude Code CLI.

projects.name: ServiceNow MCP Server
projects.description: A Model Context Protocol (MCP) server implementation for ServiceNow, enabling Claude to interact with ServiceNow instances. Production-ready with extensive feature set.
features: Multiple auth methods (Basic, OAuth, API Key)

projects.name: Claude MCP Tools
projects.description: Collection of MCP tool implementations including Memory Vault and Smart Rate Limiter servers.
features: Memory Vault: Store and search conversations with semantic embeddings
Rate Limiter: Smart rate limiting with token-aware throttling

projects.name: Task Master Proxy
projects.description: Express-based MCP proxy server that forwards queries to a Replit-deployed task manager API.
features: Forward queries to external task manager

projects.name: Momentum
projects.description: A minimal new tab page extension featuring time display, daily quotes from Naval Ravikant, and beautiful background images.

projects.name: Journal Bot
projects.description: Personal journal bot for Telegram that allows users to add and view journal entries through a bot interface.
